        public void initialize(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)

        指定者:

      • setArmy

        public void setArmy()
        This method sets the number of available army to your occupied country

      • getArmies

        public int getArmies()
        This method is used to get the number of total armies
        返回:
        The the number of total armies

      • setStartingPoints

        public void setStartingPoints()
        This method is used to reduce the number of available armies for reinforcement

      • checkIfEachCountryHasOneArmy

        public boolean checkIfEachCountryHasOneArmy(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Country> list)
        This method is used to check if each country occupied has one army
        参数:
        list - The observableList which is used to check if each county in it has one army
        返回:
        true if each country already has one army. Otherwise, return false

      • next

        public void next(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Method to set up the Reinforcement.fxml or SetUp.fxml view and set the controller for the view. Then, changes the scene on the stage to send user to the reinforcement phase or setup phase.
        参数:
        event - eventlistener for button clicked event
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown when view is not found

      • updateView

        public void updateView()
        This method is necessary for updating the view of the list
